bill_title: allow certain school districts to become nonpublic districts.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to allow certain school districts to become nonpublic districts. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 13-6 be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: A school district subject to the provisions of §§ 13-6-97 and 13-6-99 may remove itself from the state public education system upon a majority vote of the voters in that school district. A school district under this section shall be operated as and subject to the provisions of this title regarding nonpublic schools. No school district under this section may receive any public funds. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.167 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Withdrawn at the Request of the Prime Sponsor
